subject: Baseball
Rain
lead_paragraph: Colon had an R.B.I. single and extended his streak of scoreless innings to 31 before it ended, and the Mets increased their division lead to seven and a half games.
snippet: Colon had an R.B.I. single and extended his streak of scoreless innings to 31 before it ended, and the Mets increased their division lead to seven and a half games.
